==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|männl.}}, {{l|de|m.}} ''(abbreviations)'' ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|manlich}}, from {{inh|de|goh|manlīh}}, {{m|goh|manalīh}}. {{suffix|de|Mann|lich}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈmɛnlɪç/}} * {{audio|de|De-männlich.ogg|audio}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|er|sten}} # [[male]] # [[manly]] # {{lb|de|grammar|not comparable}} [[masculine]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|männlich|männlicher|männlichst}} ====Antonyms==== * {{sense|male}} {{l|de|weiblich}} * {{sense|grammar}} {{l|de|weiblich}}, {{l|de|sächlich}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Männlichkeit}} * {{l|de|vermännlichen}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Mann}} * {{l|de|Männchen}} * {{l|de|Männlein}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
